description: Looking for dinner inspo? Try this summer primavera pasta recipe with chicken breast. This meal is budget-friendly, making it perfect for a family dinner.
name: Summer Primavera & Chicken Pasta Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 2 tbs Woolworths extra virgin olive oil

recipeInstructions.text: Add pasta, power greens, and remaining oil and reserved cooking liquid to vegetable mixture, then toss to combine. Divide pasta mixture among bowls. Sprinkle with parmesan and season with pepper. Serve with lemon wedges.
